description:
The end of the year means it’s time to reflect on what’s really important in life: friends, family — and Windows PC tips.

That may sound silly, but I’ve always believed it’s true. Useful tech tips and solutions help people get work done and accomplish tasks quickly so they can get back to what’s actually important in their lives.

I’ve shared a lot of PC tips over the last year. It’s easy for some of that to get lost in the hustle and bustle. So, as we wrap up 2024, it’s a good time to look back at the best advice of the year — especially useful Windows suggestions that can take your computing to the next level, whether you’re being productive on the job or just twea
title: The top Windows PC tips of 2024
